text: mariyu allah jivanopadhi visayanlo milo kondariki marikondaripai adhikyatanu prasadincadu. Kani i adhikyata ivvabadina varu tama jivanopadhini tama adhinanlo unna variki (banisalaku) ivvataniki istapadaru. Endukante varu tamato samanulu avutaremonani! Emi? Varu allah anugrahanni tiraskaristunnara
